tool_name: MX - Email server UP or DOWN
tool_description: This API allows you to check the availability of an email server for a specified domain, determining whether it is operational or not.

api_list.name: Check EMAIL server
api_list.description: This API endpoint returns the status of the email server, indicating whether it is up or down for the specified domain.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain name for which the email server status is being checked.
